item.title: Visualizing Game of Thrones with BERT
item.author: Author
item.description: In this article, we will visualize Game of Thrones books with BERT in 3D space.

item.title: Building Question Answering Model at Scale using ü§óTransformers
item.author: Author
item.description: In this article, you will learn how to fetch contextual answers in a huge corpus of documents using Transformersü§ó. We will build a neural question and answering system using transformers models (`RoBERTa`). This approach is capable to perform Q&A across millions of documents in few seconds.

item.title: Codeüìù: Fine Tune BERT Model for Binary Text Classification
item.author: Author
item.description: This is the code for downloading and fine tuning pre-trained BERT model on custom dataset for binary text classification
